column5: The MSc in Cyberpsychology at ATU Donegal offers a deep understanding of the intersection between psychology and technology. It builds on the knowledge and skills gained from undergraduate degrees and provides students with the opportunity to develop their expertise further in this growing field.Students will learn how digital technologies impact human behaviour and interactions online, and how they can be used to enhance well-being, communication, and learning.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
